StoredProcedureOraclev10g.name: SP_INSERT_ERDV_FACTUSDSL
StoredProcedureOraclev10g.source:
create or replace
PROCEDURE AXIONEUSER_FACTU.SP_INSERT_ERDV_FACTUSDSL AS

BEGIN

--insertion des données dans la factu sdsl sfr
insert into T_FDSL_FACTURATION (ID_SERVICE,MONTANT_HT,DATE_FACTURATION,ID_SERVICE2,IDENTITE,
NRA,VIA,TYPE_TECHNO,TYPE_DEGROUPAGE,NOM_DSP,CODE_CHARGE,NOM_FAI,NBPAIRES,
ID_COMMANDE_SFR,DATE_CMDE,PLOT,ADRESSE,RIVOLI,CODE_INSEE,CODE_POSTAL,COMMUNE,VIA_GTR,NUM_VOIE)
select via_dgt,montant, trunc (sysdate, 'MONTH'), ndi, abonne,
nra, via_dgt,techno,typedegroupage,dsp, 'SDSL-CONST-ERDV','NEUF CEGETEL',nbpaires,
idcommande,date_factu,port,adresse, rivoli, code_insee, code_postal, commune,via_gtr, num_voie
from S_FACTURE_ERDV_SFR_BYTELGP
where fai = '9C' and techno = 'SDSL';

commit;

END SP_INSERT_ERDV_FACTUSDSL;
StoredProcedureOraclev10g.body:
create or replace
PROCEDURE AXIONEUSER_FACTU.SP_INSERT_ERDV_FACTUSDSL AS

BEGIN

--insertion des données dans la factu sdsl sfr
insert into T_FDSL_FACTURATION (ID_SERVICE,MONTANT_HT,DATE_FACTURATION,ID_SERVICE2,IDENTITE,
NRA,VIA,TYPE_TECHNO,TYPE_DEGROUPAGE,NOM_DSP,CODE_CHARGE,NOM_FAI,NBPAIRES,
ID_COMMANDE_SFR,DATE_CMDE,PLOT,ADRESSE,RIVOLI,CODE_INSEE,CODE_POSTAL,COMMUNE,VIA_GTR,NUM_VOIE)
select via_dgt,montant, trunc (sysdate, 'MONTH'), ndi, abonne,
nra, via_dgt,techno,typedegroupage,dsp, 'SDSL-CONST-ERDV','NEUF CEGETEL',nbpaires,
idcommande,date_factu,port,adresse, rivoli, code_insee, code_postal, commune,via_gtr, num_voie
from S_FACTURE_ERDV_SFR_BYTELGP
where fai = '9C' and techno = 'SDSL';

commit;

END SP_INSERT_ERDV_FACTUSDSL;
